comment: Offline的ID solver有四种模式：sample, save, display, solve.
sample模式: 是批量采样、保存轨迹(trajectory)信息、生成数据信息记录表；对应的配置卸载SampleModeInfo中
save模式: 单个、离散的保存轨迹, 对应的配置写在SaveModeInfo中
display模式: 播放某个轨迹，对应的配置写在DisplayModeInfo中
solve模式: 对某个轨迹进行求解, 对应的配置写在SolveModeInfo中

DisplayModeInfo._comment: this section focus on the setting of display mode

SolveModeInfo._comment: this section focus on the setting of solve mode
